text: NGC 371 is an open cluster 200,000 light-years (61,320 pc) away located in the Small Magellanic Cloud in Tucana constellation. ==References== ==External links== * * The Rose-red Glow of Star Formation - ESO Photo release Category:Dwarf galaxies 0371 Category:Small Magellanic Cloud 18260801 Category:Tucana (constellation)
title: NGC 371
